author: Dale DeGroff
description: A Tangy and fresh Gin Sour without the egg white. A juniper heavy gin and dashes of bitters are key to the success of this sour.
name: Fitzgerald
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)
2 dash Angostura or other aromatic bitters

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
